Biostatistics and Data Science Workshop

Winter 2023 • UC Berkeley • Division of Biostatistics

A bit introduction on the program.

  • Time: Jan 3 - 6?
  • Location: TBD
  • Online lectures: The lectures will be live-streamed through Zoom to selected audience. They will also be recorded, and made available on YouTube.
  • Contact: For all information regarding the program, please email us at berkeleybiostatdataprogram@gmail.com.
